  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 625x18
            text run at (0,0) width 625: "I should be highlighted first because of the anchor, and de-highlighted when there is no fragment."
